paper_keywords: Robustness to geometric deformations and transformations applied to the image
paper_abstract: The aim of this paper is to highlight the relevance in computer vision of the pointwise Lipschitz regularity alpha aa"e. The regularity alpha gives a measure of the local regularity of the intensity function associated to an image. Known wavelet methods provide an efficient computation of alpha at contour points of the image. From a theoretical point of view, we study the effect of geometric deformations and other specific transformations applied to the image, showing invariance properties. From a practical point of view, we assess the robustness of the regularity alpha when the image undergoes various transformations. The results we obtain show the Lipschitz regularity alpha is a suitable feature for applications in computer vision.
paper_title: Study of a Robust Feature: The Pointwise Lipschitz Regularity
